item.title: How to create 3D Interactive choropleth map in R
item.author: csaybar@gmail.com (Cesar Aybar)
item.description: 1. Intro A Choropleth map is a thematic map in which areas are colored considering the quantitative measurement of a variable, such as population density or gross domestic product. There are a lot of libraries in R (and of course in Python too) that perform it efficiently. However, I feel that ggplot2 offers the fastest and most friendly way. Donâ€™t you believe me?
